text: Sathya Vaakku (English: True promise) is a 1990 Indian Tamil film, directed by R. Aravindraj and produced by Ramavasudevan. The film stars Prabhu, Shobhana, and Ramya Krishnan in lead roles. The film had musical score by Gyan Varma. ==Cast== *Prabhu *Shobhana *Ramya Krishnan *Tara *Nassar *Vinu Chakravarthy ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by Kiyaan Varma. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! Chithra || Aravindraj || 4:24 |} ==Reception== The Indian Express wrote "the film survives only because of its low-light photography, nicely choreographed suspense sequences [..] and a high decibel background score".https://news.google.com/newspapers?nid=P9oYG7HA76QC&dat;=19910104&printsec;=frontpage&hl;=en ==References== ==External links== Category:1990 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Tamil-language films Category:Indian action thriller films Category:Films directed by R.
